name: Ghost Train (Doctor_Emmet, Repzy, chloekav, MonsieurHao, siobhanha, r00k)
name_original: Ghost Train (Doctor_Emmet, Repzy, chloekav, MonsieurHao, siobhanha, r00k)
description:
Howdy partner! Your train through the lonesome west has been overrun by fearsome ghost cacti. Free the passengers and the driver before you roll to your doom. Jump to the ghost realm to shoot the ghost critters, but beware... if you linger there too long, you may lose your mind!

Made as part of Global Game Jam 2022

Credits: 

Katherine Foyle - 2D Art & Narrative

Siobhán Hardt - 3D Art

Chloe Kavanagh - Programming

Sara Yamit - Programming & VFX

Chris McHugh - Programming

Thomas Costa - Programming & VFX

Caoimhe Doyle - Programming

Emmet Burke - SFX
